content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential landlord named Peter Schmidt.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was 1200 Euros per month, including all utilities.
name: Evaluator

content: No, you did not say that. You asked what the final price was, and I answered that we agreed upon 1200 Euros per month, including all utilities.
name: Evaluator
